name: A Mixture Of Movies Quiz | Movies Grab Bag | 25 Questions

questions.text: In the film 'Saving Private Ryan', who plays Private Ryan?
questions.explanation:
Matt Damon.

	A war drama movie directed by Steven Spielberg.

questions.text: Which of the Baldwin brothers stars in 'Backdraft'?
questions.explanation:
William.

	This film is directed by former 'Happy Days' star Ron Howard.

questions.text: What is the name of the film about a college lecturer who gets poisoned and has about 24 hours to live?
questions.explanation:
D.O.A.

	This movie starred Dennis Quaid and Meg Ryan.

questions.text: Which actress was sued for breach of contract after refusing the lead role in the film 'Boxing Helena'?
questions.explanation:
Kim Basinger.

	Sherilyn Fenn got the role.

questions.text: Which actor actually injured himself while shooting a film, and then incorporated the injury into the film?
questions.explanation:
Brad Pitt.

	He injured himself while shooting 'Se7en' with Morgan Freeman.

questions.text: Which film created the famous scene where a young man danced around his lounge room in his underwear?
questions.explanation:
Risky Business.

	Tom Cruise did the dancing. (Personally, I'd prefer an actress!)

questions.text: Which of the following TV show stars has NOT appeared in a 'Scream' film (as of Oct 2001)?
questions.explanation:
Jennifer Love Hewitt.

	Jennifer Love Hewitt has been in the 'I Know What You Did Last Summer' movies, but not in the 'Scream' series.

questions.text: Which film wasn't Jim Carrey in?
questions.explanation:
Fathers' Day.

	'Fathers' Day' starred Robin Williams.

questions.text: Wes Craven is famous for his horror movies, but he recently directed his first drama movie. What was it called?
questions.explanation:
Music Of The Heart.

	I can't believe it!

questions.text: Which actor made his movie debut in 'He Knows You're Alone'?
questions.explanation:
Tom Hanks.

	This was in 1980.

questions.text: In the film 'Gladiator', Russell Crowe portrays which character?
questions.explanation:
Maximus.

	This film was directed by Ridley Scott, the director of 'Alien'.

questions.text: Which film, directed by Orson Welles, has been voted the best film of all time by many film critics?
questions.explanation:
Citizen Kane.

	This film was made in 1941.

questions.text: Which film has been voted the worst film of all time by many film critics?
questions.explanation:
Plan 9 From Outer Space.

	This film was made in 1959.

questions.text: Who starred as James Bond in 'License To Kill'?
questions.explanation:
Timothy Dalton.

	The last James Bond movie before Pierce Brosnan took over the lead.

questions.text: Which Adam Sandler film has his character urinating on a door and a wall?
questions.explanation:
Big Daddy.

	He's doing it with a kid.

questions.text: Famous singer Mariah Carey had her movie debut in which film?
questions.explanation:
The Bachelor.

	There are so many brides in this movie!

questions.text: What movie is this quote from: 'Chicks dig the car'?
questions.explanation:
Batman and Robin.

	This was one of the 'Batman' films featuring Robin.

questions.text: Who was the director of movies such as 'RoboCop', 'Total Recall', 'Starship Troopers' and 'Hollow Man'?
questions.explanation:
Paul Verhoeven.

	He has directed many controversial films.

questions.text: Jackie Chan has been in many films. Considering only the four listed films, which is the most recent?
questions.explanation:
Shanghai Noon.

	He does his own stunts!

questions.text: Which of the following films didn't win an Oscar in the acting category?
questions.explanation:
Titanic.

	'Titanic' won a record 11 Oscars, but surprisingly, none were for the acting in the film.

questions.text: Which of the following films has spawned the most sequels as of November 2000?
questions.explanation:
Superman.

	It spawned three sequels.

questions.text: The novel 'Do Androids Dream Of Electric Sheep?' was made into which movie?
questions.explanation:
Blade Runner.

	This movie starred Harrison Ford.

questions.text: Who did the voice of the genie in the movie 'Aladdin'?
questions.explanation:
Robin Williams.

	Tim Allen and Tom Hanks did voices for 'Toy Story'.

questions.text: Who said the phrase 'Go ahead, make my day'?
questions.explanation:
Clint Eastwood.

	From the 'Dirty Harry' movie series.

questions.text: And finally: 'I Don't Wanna Miss A Thing' is the song for which movie?
questions.explanation:
Armageddon.

	The movie about the end of the world.
